pageTitle: Simphple: Process templates compiling into PHP code - PHP Classes
textBeforeTable: tokkara This package can process templates compiling into PHP code. It can compile a given template generating PHP code that can output the processed template. The generated template PHP code is store in a cache directory. The template engine supports marks that define template control structures like conditions, replacement of variables and constant values, loops iterating over arrays, functions and operators to transform values, include additional templates, etc..     Author   Description PHP 5, Cache, Templates, Code Generation 5.0 GNU Lesser Genera... simphple 1.1.1     Categories
